name: Petshop.io
description: PTSHP is a crypto asset developed by Bitci Borsa Teknoloji Anonim Limited on Bitcichain. Petshop.io has emerged in order to solve the problems of animals and their owners, which are a part of our lives, and to make their lives easier in changing and transforming end-user behavior in the increasingly digital world. Petshop.io is an application that offers pet owners all solutions from A to Z.
